abstract: Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, told Syracuse University graduates he was confident the United States would see a recovery in the short term, but the country’s condition over the longer term was in the hands of the next generation.
snippet: Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, told Syracuse University graduates he was confident the United States would see a recovery in the short term, but the country’s condition over the longer term was in the hands of the next generat...
lead_paragraph: Jamie Dimon has passed the torch, in a manner of speaking.

headline.main: Dimon Urges Next Generation to Improve U.S.
